title: Hello World, Bash!
description: Dive into the world of shell scripting with this hands-on lab. Learn to create, edit, and execute a simple Bash script that prints the classic 'Hello, World!' message. Master essential Linux commands and Bash scripting fundamentals along the way.

meta.title: Your First Bash Script: Hello World in Shell Programming
meta.description: Begin your journey in shell scripting by creating a 'Hello, World!' program in Bash. Learn file creation, editing, permissions, and script execution in this beginner-friendly lab.
meta.keywords: bash scripting, shell programming, linux commands, hello world, chmod, echo, shebang, beginner tutorial, script execution
